title: Citi Earns 25 Spots on Bank Investment Consultant's Top 100 Bank Advisors List for 2018
summary: New York - Citi's growing team of Financial Advisors garnered 25 positions on Bank Investment Consultant's annual Top 100 Bank Advisors list.
tag-1: Citi Earns 25 Spots on Bank Investment Consultant's Top 100 Bank Advisors List for 2018
tag-3: New York – Citi's growing team of Financial Advisors garnered 25 positions on Bank Investment Consultant's annual Top 100 Bank Advisors list.
tag-4: Citi Personal Wealth Management Financial Advisors Andrew Vahab, Christopher Barron and David Guthrie, all based in New York City, were named to the Top 10.
tag-5: "With a reimagined Citigold value proposition and new benefits backed by innovative technology, Citi Personal Wealth Management is relentlessly focused on providing our clients with world-class investment service and guidance," said John Cummings, Head of U.S. Consumer Wealth Management.
tag-6: "We've strengthened our teams to deliver the personalized service and guidance that's important to being our clients' most trusted and valued financial advisors," added Rebecca Macieira-Kaufmann, Head of Citi's International Personal Bank.
tag-7: Bank Investment Consultant, a leading online publication for bank-based wealth managers, based its ranking on a composite score that incorporates such measures as production, assets under management and percentage growth in AUM.
tag-8: The following Citi Financial Advisors were named to this year's BIC Top 100:

tag-10: Citi continues to invest in the professional development of its Financial Advisors and Relationship Managers. This year Citi and the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania marked the third anniversary of the Citi Wharton Global Wealth Institute, expanding the first-of-its-kind executive education program in May with the introduction of Excellence in Sales Leadership, a new curriculum and set of courses for the team leaders of Citi Financial Advisors and Relationship Managers. Since its launch in October 2015, more than 1,000 Citi Relationship Managers and Financial Advisors have participated in the program. Initially launched in Philadelphia and Beijing, the program has expanded to Mexico City, San Francisco and Cambridge.
tag-11: Over the past two years Citi has introduced enhanced client offerings and capabilities, including new Citigold and Citi Priority value propositions, Citigold Client Centers, the largest fee-free ATM network nationwide and new functionality for the Citi Mobile® App for iPhone® that offers a suite of banking, wealth management and payment services and cutting-edge authentication features.
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
